channel.title: Posts on Eric's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Eric's Blog

item.title: Good Things
item.description: Learning materials Teach Yourself Computer Science You need answers to these questions: Which subjects should you learn, and why? What is the best book or video lecture series for each subject? CS自学指南 某种程度上，这本书更像是一个根据我的体验来排序的课程搜索引擎，帮助大家足不出户，体验世界顶级名校的计算机优质课程。 Information input Weekly Star Rocket 科技创业周报 DecoHack: 产品；独立创作者 Forums Hacker News Podcasts 星箭廣播（和上面的 Star Rocket 周报是一家） More than coding People bmpi ：涉及终身学习、全栈技术和投资理财 She’s Danni：程序员的生活 Randy Lu：前端、编程学习 Podcasts Steve说：心理学、访谈 Blow your mind：心理学、杂谈 Applications I’m using 时间管理：滴答清单（使用 806 天，完成了 1631 个任务 🆒）

item.title: Change log
item.description: 03/05/2022 New domain: ericji.net, https complete. 03/04/2022 Buy and set a domain. 02/15/2022 Add change log, home info and social icons. 02/14/2022 Website starts with Hugo, GitHub and Netlify.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post with Hugo! It’s great! Eric
